summary: Completed testing of specific review request items: Observability navigation, POS send flow doPrint fix, and admin page accessibility. Backend APIs working correctly, frontend code properly implemented with fixes, but frontend authentication flow has issues preventing full UI testing.

minor_bugs.issue: 404 error capture middleware not working as expected

ui_bugs.issue: PIN entry (1234) not completing authentication properly - stays on login screen
Admin pages showing blank screens even with token injection

integration_issues.issue: Frontend login flow not working despite backend API returning valid tokens

passed_tests: Backend observability APIs working (Test Panel, Error Inbox)
doPrint fix confirmed in code (sendOptions.do_print usage)
Observability components exist with proper data-testids
TestPanel.jsx and ErrorInbox.jsx components properly implemented
NewSidebar.jsx includes Observability link with data-testid
POSMain.js uses sendOptions.do_print instead of doPrint
AdminLayout.js has proper sidebar offset configuration
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend authentication flow - PIN entry (1234) not completing login properly. Backend authentication API works but frontend login process fails to navigate to admin dashboard. Also investigate why admin pages show blank screens even with direct token injection.
